summary: 2006 FORD TAURUS.  STARTED DECELERATING IN THE MIDDLE OF TRAFFIC.  ENGINE STARTS AND CHECK ENGINE LIGHT GOES OFF AND STAYS OFF SO PROBABLY NO DPC CODE. TRANSMISSION DOES NOT WORK AT ALL. FORD SHOP SAID IT'S NOT THEIR PROBLEM BECAUSE IT'S OUT OF WARRANTY.  IT HAS 107,000 MILES ON IT.  IT WAS BY THE GRACE OF GOD THAT I DIDN'T CAUSE AN ACCIDENT. *TR
